TopicTitle: What is the soundtrack of the R&D building

Articles.Content: when i go unlock science, i hum the whole soundtrack through... WHAT IS IT?!
The chief developer, Felipe Falanghe (Harvester), wrote most of the sound track. Maybe he wrote that too.
yea but i also heard that ksp used some macleod tracks too...

Yeah, several tracks are from Kevin McLeod.

I spent some time on his site, and downloaded several that I recognized and enjoyed, whether from KSP (the VAB track!) or Danny KSP videos (Spazzmatica Polka!)...

This

seems to have compiled a nice playlist of KSP tracks, indicating who wrote each track (I'm at work and therefore have no sound, so I couldn't check before posting this link). Edited November 22, 2013 by el_coyoto
